sections.general: lead construction manager / regional quality manager
sections.summary: proactive project manager experienced in managing a variety of construction teams and projects. successful in creating effective communication between personnel, general contractors and the management team. highlights ms office proficient organized and detail-oriented blueprint fluency superb management skills power and hand tool operation project budgeting residential construction specialist building codes and regulations cost control permit processing baseline schedules creation safe job site set-up
